/usr/bin/c++  -g   CMakeFiles/project.dir/src/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/project.dir/src/glad.c.o CMakeFiles/project.dir/src/IndexBuffer.cpp.o CMakeFiles/project.dir/src/VertexBuffer.cpp.o CMakeFiles/project.dir/src/VertexArray.cpp.o  -o project   -L/home/max/Documents/CG_OpenGL/CG_Lab2/lib  -Wl,-rpath,/home/max/Documents/CG_OpenGL/CG_Lab2/lib -lglfw3 -lGL -lX11 -lpthread -lXrandr -lXi -ldl
